posts.post_content:
Drive the math geek in your family crazy by *insisting* that -5/2 = 0, directing them to this page during the ensuing argument, and pointing to the rulings.  
  
*If you attempt to halve a negative life total, you halve 0.*  
  
(Confession: I'm a math geek, and winced at this for like ten seconds, even though I know which rule it's clarifying...)
posts.html:

Posted By: Salient (1/18/2012 7:57:48 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I can't tell if this would be considered good today or not. I'm not disputing that the effect of drawing four cards is great- that's just amazing- but 3 colored mana and half your life? Would that see standard, or are the cards they make today not powerful enough in their interactions to make it worth it? (I.E. are the combos degenerate enough?) Also it is sorcery speed, though that would matter much much less if it's mana cost were less prohibitive.
  
   
Interesting card, but for 3 black mana I'd rather run Necropotence. 3.5 stars because being good then does not always mean would be broken today....
posts.html:
I can't tell if this would be considered good today or not. I'm not disputing that the effect of drawing four cards is great- that's just amazing- but 3 colored mana and half your life? Would that see standard, or are the cards they make today not powerful enough in their interactions to make it worth it? (I.E. are the combos degenerate enough?) Also it is sorcery speed, though that would matter much much less if it's mana cost were less prohibitive.

Interesting card, but for 3 black mana I'd rather run Necropotence. 3.5 stars because being good then does not always mean would be broken today....
